name: Haunted House Escape: A VR Experience presented by MEPTIK
name_original: Haunted House Escape: A VR Experience presented by MEPTIK
description:
You wake up in an empty, abandoned house, all alone. How did you get here? It's stormy outside.  You hear the wind creaking through the old wooden boards of the house. Why is "Let me Out" written all over the walls? What was that noise?!  Maybe you are not the only one in the house...

In this virtual reality escape mini-game, the player has to find the hidden keys to escape the haunted house. The experience is available for all Oculus systems. 

The game was created in unreal engine. Physical actors were placed in the virtual environment, using xR technology.

Find out more about the creation of the game here: https://www.meptik.com/haunted-house-escape-vr-experience
